column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " Looks like someone 's trying to take your place as the Avatar 's stick - in - the - mud mentor . "
#Text=Kya says : " Bumi , do n't pick on Tenzin .

#Text=" Unalaq says : " As your chief , it is my honor to speak at this festival , which was founded to bring our tribes together and restore the ancient balance between our world and that of the spirits .
#Text=But I am saddened to see what it has become : a cheap carnival that celebrates greedy and trivial humans .
#Text=I feel the time is fast approaching when the North can no longer stand idly by while our Southern brothers slip into total spiritual decay .
#Text=Angry spirits are already attacking ships in your waters .
#Text=I only hope we are not too late to change course .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Chief Unalaq everybody , always great to have him in town .
#Text=Now , let 's have some fun with Wacky Wushu 's Dancing Otter penguins !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wish me luck .
#Text=I 'm making my move !
#Text=Whee !
#Text=" Mako says : " Good luck .
#Text=" Korra says : " Those two have always creeped me out .
#Text=They smell like a grandma 's attic .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , I 'm Bolin .
#Text=I 'm a friend of Korra 's !
#Text=You 're , uh , Eska right ?
#Text=Wow , I 'm just , I am loving these robes .
#Text=So , you are from the north right ?
#Text=Cool , that 's , like you know , that 's my favorite direction .
#Text=" Desna says : " I think he is trying to establish some kind of bond with you based on your geographic point of origin .
#Text=" Eska says : " Perhaps it would be interesting to spend time with a person whose ways are so rough and uncultured .
#Text=You amuse me .
#Text=I will make you mine .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You mean like a boyfriend , or like a slave ... ?
#Text=" Eska says : " Yes .
#Text=Win me prizes .
#Text=" Korra says : " Unalaq offered to train me .
#Text=He says he can teach me about the spirits and my connection to them .
#Text=" Mako says : " Sounds good .
#Text=What does Tenzin think ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Tenzin thinks I 'm his prisoner or one of his kids .
#Text=I 'll never finish training with him in charge .
#Text=" Game guy says : " We have a winner !
#Text=" Korra says : " I mean , you heard what Unalaq said .
#Text=The South is spiritually unbalanced and it 's the Avatar 's job to fix it , but my dad wo n't even let me think about Unalaq teaching me .
#Text=Well ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Well what ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you think I should do ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I guess you should do what you think is right .
#Text=I support whatever decision you make .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh thanks .
#Text=That 's a big help .
#Text=" Mako says : " I thought you wanted me to be supportive ?
#Text=Now you want me to tell you what I think ?
#Text=Make up your mind !
#Text=" Korra says : " Just forget it .
#Text="
